thread.title: Lannett to Acquire UCB’s Kremers Urban Pharmaceuticals Unit for $1.23 Billion
thread.title_full: Lannett to Acquire UCB’s Kremers Urban Pharmaceuticals Unit for $1.23 Billion - WSJ

author: Maria Armental
title: Lannett to Acquire UCB’s Kremers Urban Pharmaceuticals Unit for $1.23 Billion
text:
Lannett Co. Inc. has agreed to buy UCB SA’s Kremers Urban Pharmaceuticals Inc. for $1.23 billion.
The deal, expected to close in the fourth quarter, also calls for potential contingency payments under sales and timing thresholds.
Lannett, which said it is borrowing up to $1.29 billion to pay for the acquisition, estimated a mid- to...
